pcl_example.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*
2  * This example is based on "Building a Perception Pipleline" of ROS Industrial Training
3  *
4  * * https://industrial-training-master.readthedocs.io/en/melodic/_source/session5/Building-a-Perception-Pipeline.html
5  * * https://industrial-training-master.readthedocs.io/en/kinetic/_source/session5/Building-a-Perception-Pipeline.html
6  * * https://industrial-training-jp.readthedocs.io/ja/latest/_source/session5_JP/Building-a-Perception-Pipeline_JP.html
7  *
8  */
9 
10 #include <ros/ros.h>
11 #include <tf/transform_datatypes.h>
12 #include <tf/transform_listener.h>
13 #include <tf/transform_broadcaster.h>
14 #include <sensor_msgs/PointCloud2.h> //hydro
15 
16 // PCL specific includes
17 #include <pcl_conversions/pcl_conversions.h> //hydro
18 #include "pcl_ros/transforms.h"
19 
20 #include <pcl/filters/voxel_grid.h>
21 #include <pcl/filters/passthrough.h>
22 #include <pcl/sample_consensus/method_types.h>
23 #include <pcl/sample_consensus/model_types.h>
24 #include <pcl/segmentation/sac_segmentation.h>
25 #include <pcl/filters/extract_indices.h>
26 #include <pcl/segmentation/extract_clusters.h>
27 #include <pcl/filters/crop_box.h>
28 #include <pcl/filters/statistical_outlier_removal.h>
29 #include <tf_conversions/tf_eigen.h>
30 #include <pcl/segmentation/extract_polygonal_prism_data.h>
31 
32 
33 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
34 {
35  /*
36  * INITIALIZE ROS NODE
37  */
38  ros::init( argc, argv, "pcl_example" );
39  ros::NodeHandle nh;
40  ros::NodeHandle priv_nh_( "~" );
41 
42  /*
43  * SET UP PARAMETERS (COULD BE INPUT FROM LAUNCH FILE/TERMINAL)
44  */
45  std::string cloud_topic, world_frame, camera_frame;
46  world_frame = "map";
47  camera_frame = "camera_depth";
48  cloud_topic = "/camera/depth/points";
49 
50  /*
51  * SETUP PUBLISHERS
52  */
53  ros::Publisher object_pub, cluster_pub, pose_pub;
54  object_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>( "object_cluster" , 1 );
55  cluster_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>( "primary_cluster", 1 );
56 
57  while (ros::ok())
58  {
59  /*
60  * LISTEN FOR POINTCLOUD
61  */
62  std::string topic = nh.resolveName(cloud_topic);
63  ROS_INFO_STREAM( "Cloud service called; waiting for a PointCloud2 on topic "<< topic );
64  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr recent_cloud =
65  ros::topic::waitForMessage<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(topic, nh);
66 
67  /*
68  * TRANSFORM POINTCLOUD FROM CAMERA FRAME TO WORLD FRAME
69  */
70  tf::TransformListener listener;
71  tf::StampedTransform stransform;
72  try
73  {
74  listener.waitForTransform(world_frame, recent_cloud->header.frame_id, ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(6.0));
75  listener.lookupTransform(world_frame, recent_cloud->header.frame_id, ros::Time(0), stransform);
76  }
77  catch (tf::TransformException ex)
78  {
79  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
80  }
81  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 transformed_cloud;
82  // sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr recent_cloud =
83  // ros::topic::waitForMessage<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(topic, nh);
84  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(world_frame, stransform, *recent_cloud, transformed_cloud);
85 
86  /*
87  * CONVERT POINTCLOUD ROS->PCL
88  */
89  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> cloud;
90  pcl::fromROSMsg (transformed_cloud, cloud);
91 
92  /* ========================================
93  * Fill Code: VOXEL GRID
94  * ========================================*/
95  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_ptr (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> (cloud));
96  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_voxel_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
97  pcl::VoxelGrid<pcl::PointXYZ> voxel_filter;
98  voxel_filter.setInputCloud (cloud_ptr);
99  voxel_filter.setLeafSize ( float(0.01), float(0.01), float(0.01) );
100  voxel_filter.filter (*cloud_voxel_filtered);
101 
102  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Original cloud had " << cloud_ptr->size() << " points");
103  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Downsampled cloud with " << cloud_voxel_filtered->size() << " points");
104 
105  /* ========================================
106  * Fill Code: PASSTHROUGH FILTER(S)
107  * ========================================*/
108  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> xf_cloud, yf_cloud, zf_cloud;
109  pcl::PassThrough<pcl::PointXYZ> pass_x;
110  pass_x.setInputCloud(cloud_voxel_filtered);
111  pass_x.setFilterFieldName("x");
112  pass_x.setFilterLimits( -1.0, 0.5 );
113  pass_x.filter(xf_cloud);
114 
115  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr xf_cloud_ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>(xf_cloud));
116  pcl::PassThrough<pcl::PointXYZ> pass_y;
117  pass_y.setInputCloud(xf_cloud_ptr);
118  pass_y.setFilterFieldName("y");
119  pass_y.setFilterLimits( -0.3, 0.3 );
120  pass_y.filter(yf_cloud);
121 
122  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr yf_cloud_ptr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>(yf_cloud));
123  pcl::PassThrough<pcl::PointXYZ> pass_z;
124  pass_z.setInputCloud(yf_cloud_ptr);
125  pass_z.setFilterFieldName("z");
126  pass_z.setFilterLimits( -1.0, 3.0 );
127  pass_z.filter(zf_cloud);
128 
129  /* ========================================
130  * Fill Code: STATISTICAL OUTLIER REMOVAL (OPTIONAL)
131  * ========================================*/
132  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr zf_cloud_ptr( new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>(zf_cloud));
133  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr sor_cloud_filtered(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
134  pcl::StatisticalOutlierRemoval<pcl::PointXYZ> sor;
135  sor.setInputCloud( zf_cloud_ptr );
136  sor.setMeanK ( 16 );
137  sor.setStddevMulThresh ( 0.5 );
138  sor.filter ( *sor_cloud_filtered );
139 
140  /* ========================================
141  * Fill Code: CROPBOX (OPTIONAL)
142  * ========================================*/
143 
144  /* ========================================
145  * Fill Code: PLANE SEGEMENTATION
146  * ========================================*/
147  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cropped_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>( *sor_cloud_filtered ));
148  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_f (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
149  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_filtered (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
150  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_plane (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
151 
152  // Create the segmentation object for the planar model and set all the parameters
153  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
154  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
155  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
156  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
157  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
158  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
159  seg.setMaxIterations (100);
160  seg.setDistanceThreshold (0.02);
161 
162  // Segment the largest planar component from the cropped cloud
163  seg.setInputCloud (cropped_cloud);
164  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
165  if (inliers->indices.size () == 0)
166  {
167  ROS_WARN_STREAM ("Could not estimate a planar model for the given dataset.") ;
168  //break;
169  }
170 
171  // Extract the planar inliers from the input cloud
172  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
173  extract.setInputCloud (cropped_cloud);
174  extract.setIndices(inliers);
175  extract.setNegative (false);
176 
177  // Get the points associated with the planar surface
178  extract.filter (*cloud_plane);
179  ROS_INFO_STREAM("PointCloud representing the planar component: " << cloud_plane->points.size () << " data points." );
180 
181  // Remove the planar inliers, extract the rest
182  extract.setNegative (true);
183  extract.filter ( *cloud_f );
184 
185  /* ========================================
186  * Fill Code: PUBLISH PLANE MARKER (OPTIONAL)
187  * ========================================*/
188 
189 
190  /* ========================================
191  * Fill Code: EUCLIDEAN CLUSTER EXTRACTION (OPTIONAL/RECOMMENDED)
192  * ========================================*/
193 
194 
195  // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
196  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>);
197  *cloud_filtered = *cloud_f;
198  tree->setInputCloud (cloud_filtered);
199 
200  std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> cluster_indices;
201  pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZ> ec;
202  ec.setClusterTolerance (0.01); // 2cm
203  ec.setMinClusterSize (300);
204  ec.setMaxClusterSize (10000);
205  ec.setSearchMethod (tree);
206  ec.setInputCloud (cloud_filtered);
207  ec.extract (cluster_indices);
208 
209  std::vector<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::Ptr> pc2_clusters;
210  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr > clusters;
211  for (std::vector<pcl::PointIndices>::const_iterator it = cluster_indices.begin (); it != cluster_indices.end (); ++it)
212  {
213  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr cloud_cluster (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
214  for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator pit = it->indices.begin (); pit != it->indices.end (); pit++)
215  cloud_cluster->points.push_back(cloud_filtered->points[*pit]);
216  cloud_cluster->width = cloud_cluster->points.size ();
217  cloud_cluster->height = 1;
218  cloud_cluster->is_dense = true;
219  std::cout << "Cluster has " << cloud_cluster->points.size() << " points.\n";
220  clusters.push_back(cloud_cluster);
221  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::Ptr tempROSMsg(new sensor_msgs::PointCloud2);
222  pcl::toROSMsg(*cloud_cluster, *tempROSMsg);
223  pc2_clusters.push_back(tempROSMsg);
224  }
225 
226  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr largest_cluster (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>);
227  *largest_cluster = *(clusters.at(0));
228 
229  /* ========================================
230  * Fill Code: PUBLISH OTHER MARKERS (OPTIONAL)
231  * ========================================*/
232 
233 
234  /* ========================================
235  * BROADCAST TRANSFORM (OPTIONAL)
236  * ========================================*/
237  static tf::TransformBroadcaster br;
238  tf::Transform part_transform;
239 
240  // Calculate Centroid Largest PointCloud Cluster
241  Eigen::Vector4f xyz_centroid;
242  pcl::compute3DCentroid( *largest_cluster, xyz_centroid );
243 
244  part_transform.setOrigin( tf::Vector3( xyz_centroid[0] , xyz_centroid[1], xyz_centroid[2] ) );
245  tf::Quaternion q;
246  q.setRPY(0, 0, 0);
247  part_transform.setRotation(q);
248 
249  br.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(part_transform, ros::Time::now(), world_frame, "part"));
250 
251  /* ========================================
252  * Fill Code: POLYGONAL SEGMENTATION (OPTIONAL)
253  * ========================================*/
254 
255 
256  /* ========================================
257  * CONVERT POINTCLOUD PCL->ROS
258  * PUBLISH CLOUD
259  * Fill Code: UPDATE AS NECESSARY
260  * ========================================*/
261  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::Ptr pc2_cloud (new sensor_msgs::PointCloud2);
262  pcl::toROSMsg( *largest_cluster, *pc2_cloud );
263  pc2_cloud->header.frame_id=world_frame;
264  pc2_cloud->header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
265  object_pub.publish(pc2_cloud);
266  }
267 
268  return 0;
269 }
270 
main
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
